mapper.select: select g.bnum, g.bname, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, g.thumbimg, g.bimg, bdes, bdate, cooktime, serving, temperature, difficult ,title, writer from write_board g inner join board_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode}

select * from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(write_board pk_write_board) */ rownum rn,bnum,bname,bimg,thumbimg,bdate,title,writer from write_board where bnum>0
and rownum <= (2 * 10)) where rn> ((2-1)*10)

select count(*) from write_board where
bnum >0

select * from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(write_board pk_write_board) */ rownum rn,bnum,bname,bimg,thumbimg,bdate,title,writer from write_board where bnum>0 and catecode = #{catecode} and rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount})) where rn> ((#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount})
